Name: Spell Hand
Description: Spell Hand is a visual overhaul of spell casting for the game Lunacid. It adds a left hand which adorns the magic rings you equip and animates according to the spells you cast.

Name: Configgy
Description: Configgy is a configuration/UI generation mod for ULTRAKILL. It aims to make creating and using configurations easier for both mod developers and users. It also auto-generates UI for existing BepInEx configurations.

Name: Ultracam
Description: A simple freecam mod for ULTRAKILL with both cinematic movement features and UnityEditor like movement.

Name: Ultrakill64
Description: A mod that enables April Fools texture filtering at all times.

Name: Trye2Gether
Description: Multiplayer mod for Knights Try. (Not yet publicly available.)

Name: Carcass
Description: Carcass adds is a brand new flying husk enemy to ULTRAKILL called The Carcass. It has many unique attacks and behaviors. Made in collaboration with Rem_Phase02

Name: UltraFunGuns
Description: UltraFunGuns is a huge content addition to ULTRAKILL. It includes 16+ new weapons, a basketball mini-game, new weapon interactions, customizable inventory, and easter eggs.

Name: HydraDynamics (Deprecated)
Description: HydraDynamics is a library mod for games made with Unity. It includes tools for data persistence, version checking, and keybinds. Most importantly it allows any mods that use it to communicate and exchange data without directly depending upon each other.

Name: UltraChat
Description: UltraChat is a global chat mod. It allows players using the mod to communicate via global chat channels. It includes filtering for specific levels and locations. (At this time UltraChat is still early in development and is not publicly available.)

Name: BossRush
Description: Boss Rush adds a brand new gamemode to Ultrakill, Boss Rush. Fight all level bosses in sequence, then start from the beginning with the bosses getting stronger on each loop. Includes run statistics, high scores, and a single-life mode.

Name: EasyPZ
Description: EasyPZ is a QoL mod for displaying currently required time, style, and kills required for obtaining the level's P rank. It also includes an auto-restart feature if you fail to meet the requirements, and a customizable color scheme.

Name: MoyaiSkulls
Description: Replaces all base game skull items with stylized Moyai statues. Also sometimes plays fun sound effects when punching with them.

Name: UltraTelephone
Description: A satirical mod designed to make ULTRAKILL feel very strange and unpredictable to play. The premise behind the development of the mod was for the code to be passed on through several developers with zero communication, hence the name Telephone. The mod was made in collaboration with numerous other ULTRAKILL mod developers whom can be found by clicking the GitHub button.
